      • getData

        public boolean getData(Player player,
                       ByteBuffer data)
        byte: 0/1 alive or dead byte: x byte: y byte: width byte: height width * height * boolean: wall array byte: players players * { byte: x byte: y } byte: shots shots * { byte: x byte: y byte: direction }
        Specified by:
        getData in class Game
        Parameters:
        player - The player's data that is being requested. This will be null if Game.hasPerPlayerData() is false
        data - A ByteBuffer that the new data is to be written to.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from class: Game
        Called when the game is externally told to close down. This is a signal to start the end process. The game will have 30 seconds once this is called to call the gameEnded method.
